item.title: Npm Error Fix Babel Core
item.description: Error # npm ERR! Found: @babel/core@7.12.3 npm ERR! node_modules/@babel/core npm ERR! @babel/core@"7.12.3" from the root project npm ERR! peer @babel/core@"^7.0.0" from @babel/helper-compilation-targets@7.13.16 npm ERR! node_modules/@babel/helper-compilation-targets npm ERR! @babel/helper-compilation-targets@"^7.13.0" from @babel/helper-define-polyfill-provider@0.2.0 npm ERR! node_modules/@babel/helper-define-polyfill-provider npm ERR! @babel/helper-define-polyfill-provider@"^0.2.0" from babel-plugin-polyfill-corejs2@0.2.0 npm ERR! node_modules/babel-plugin-polyfill-corejs2 npm ERR! babel-plugin-polyfill-corejs2@"^0.2.0" from @babel/preset-env@7.13.15 npm ERR! node_modules/@babel/preset-env npm ERR! 2 more (babel-plugin-polyfill-corejs3, babel-plugin-polyfill-regenerator) npm ERR! @babel/helper-compilation-targets@"^7.13.8" from @babel/plugin-proposal-object-rest-spread@7.13.8 npm ERR! node_modules/@babel/plugin-proposal-object-rest-spread npm ERR! @babel/plugin-proposal-object-rest-spread@"^7.13.8" from @babel/preset-env@7.13.15 npm ERR!
